headline: Winter walk
text: If you're like me, you're probably wondering what happened to winter this year. In my neck of the woods, we had a light dusting of snow that lasted for roughly three hours this winter season, and it doesn't look as though any more is on the way. So if you're missing snow, here's a nice little video, courtesy of the Natural History Museum in Tring, of a winter walk around the snowy hills of Tring with museum botanist Fred Rumsey:               Visit NaturalHistoryMuseum's YouTube channel [video link].  What animal was chewing on the cherry stones?  .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. ..
